course_name: Health Planning & Management in Settings with Limited Resources
description: The course will engage participants in the latest tools and methods for assessing population health needs, establishing health intervention priorities, and allocating health resources in resource poor contexts. The course work will be illustrated with examples, case studies, good practices, and lessons learned from field experience.
